meanings.definition: A very large and significant business transaction or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The company made a megadeal to acquire its competitor.
meanings.sent2: The megadeal between the two tech giants shook the industry.
meanings.sent3: The megadeal to buy the entire stock of chocolate bars was a sweet victory for the company.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to invest in the startup was a megadeal that paid off handsomely.
meanings.sent5: The megadeal to build a new factory created hundreds of jobs in the town.

meanings.definition: An extremely large and important deal or event.
meanings.sent1: The megadeal in the sports world was the signing of the star player.
meanings.sent2: The megadeal for the construction project was finalized after months of negotiations.
meanings.sent3: The megadeal to bring a famous singer to perform at the event was music to everyone's ears.
meanings.sent4: The megadeal to secure a rare painting for the museum was a stroke of luck.
meanings.sent5: The megadeal to launch a new product set a record for the company.
